Button styles.

  • Base button style.
  • Use a or button tag.
Button 
<a class="ag-btn">Button</a>
<button class="ag-btn ag-btn--primary">Button</button>

<button class="ag-btn ag-btn--primary"><%- name %></button>

  != name

  != name
